is a borough located in Camden County,

.  Encompassing 2.9 square miles, this quaint town has a total population of 11,593, including professional athletes from the Philadelphia Flyers and Phillies. Haddonfield offers visitors that small town feeling with a friendly atmosphere and beautiful scenery.

Haddonfield is a historic town with a rich history and many sites to see including:

value: content=The bones of the Hadrosaurus dinosaur were discovered in Haddonfield, and a monument is located in the center of downtown. This is a popular photograph spot for tourists.
directions=Off of Grove Street, on Maple Avenue
content=This is a valley where the Hadrosaurus bones were found. There is a plaque with the history of this discovery located at the site.
content=Now a museum, the tavern was built in 1750. Tours are given which reveal the rich history of colonial Haddonfield.
directions=located right off of Kings Highway Avenue

content=This street is part of the historic district of Haddonfield. The beautiful colonial homes possess breathtaking character and charm. The historic district is protected under law and cannot be torn down or altered in outward appearance.
content=This street is lined with mansions on acres of green lawns. The homes back up to the country club. These homes are some of the largest and most expensive homes in Haddonfield.
directions=where Center Street melds into Upland Way
content=includes hiking trails, a walking path around perimeter, soccer fields, baseball fields, and picnic tables. Crows Woods is a great place to take a stroll with your family or dog
content=Haddonfield's historic shopping district has been lauded by the Philadelphia Magazine as the best place to shop outside of New York City.
content=Tavistock Country Club is a private Country Club that offers an exceptional dining experience, private events and a newly renovated golf course with a Pro Shop.

content=Wedgewood Swim Club is a private club that offers tennis, volleyball and basketball courts, a play ground, games, both a baby pool and a full sized swimming pool with a diving well along with a wide range of snacks and food.
content=Penny Packer Park offers hiking trails along the Cooper River and a circuitous path around Hopkins Pond.
content=Plays and Players provides quality theater at an affordable price and includes a wide variety of productions

Haddonfield's historic shopping district has been lauded by the
as the best shopping district offering a vast array of stores

value: content=Benjamin Lovell Shoes has a wide selection of fashionable shoes including Clarks, Uggs, Rainbow Sandals and Hunters Boots.

content=with hospitable and helpful employees, Haddonfield Running Company is a speciality store where the perfect running sneaker can be found. Runners from all over the South Jersey area come to the Running Company to have their shoes personally selected for their individual needs.
content=offers a wide selection of fun and flirty clothes and accessories
content=voted best of 2005 in both Philadelphia and South Jersey Magazine, Six Clothing is a small boutique that carries hip clothing, gorgeous accessories and designer jeans.
content=Sam S. Yampell has knowledgeable employees who can help you chose the perfect piece of jewelry. The store also offers in house repairs and the ability to design custom pieces.
content=a hippy inspired store where children can purchase shoes, clothes, toys and trinkets.
content=Happy Hippo has a unique selection of toys and games for children of all ages.
name=Main Stop Salon and Day Spa
content=a one stop spot for all your beauty needs including hair, nails, massages, waxing, makeup and skin care treatments.
content=written up as the best Italian restaurant by South Jersey Magazine, Tre Famiglia offers an excellent selection of Italian cuisines.
content=Animo is an organic cafe that offers nutritious and delicious drinks, wraps, burritos and soups made daily
content=This family owned pizzeria offers take out or sit down meals in a home inspired atmosphere. This is also a popular hangout spot for middle school students after school and on the weekends.
content=the perfect place to take the family for an afternoon snack or dessert and offers the classic parlor feel and a wide array of ice cream and water ice
content=Although pricey Cold Stone has rich and innovative ice cream creations and is a popular destination for desserts.
content=Chef and Owner Marcus Severs offers an outstanding selection of seafood and steak

content=This coffee shop is located in a prime location in the heart of downtown Haddonfield. There is a separate room with comfy chairs and newspapers to enjoy while you sip on a morning cup of coffee. Outdoor seating is also available.
content=eat in or take out at the bread board plus where you can order specialty subs, salads and homemade soups.

There is only one bed and breakfast in Haddonfield.

is located in Haddonfield, New Jersey, just minutes from Philadelphia. The historic, nine-room inn is a charming Victorian exterior with every modern luxury inside. For information and reservations call (856) 428-2195 or 1-800-269-0014. 44 West End Ave. Haddonfield, New Jersey 08033
